    GUID = Begin
        0x54ca993ae492ea4c83f65cf083ac3b31
    End
    RecordSource ="SELECT IIf(IsNull(PERSONS.LNAME),\"aaa\" & exhibitjudges.jun,IIf(IsNull(judgetyp"
        "ecategories.ncat),\"aab\" & exhibitjudges.jun,JudgeTypeCategories.NCAT & Persons"
        ".LNAME & Persons.FNAME)) AS Sort, Judges.JUN AS J_JUN, JudgeTypeCategories.NCAT,"
        " Persons.LNAME, Persons.FNAME, Persons.MI, ExhibitJudges.JUN, Categories.CATNAME"
        ", Judges.JCAT, Categories.TEAM, ExhibitJudges.EXN, JudgeTypes.[JCAT NAME], Exhib"
        "itJudges.FYR, Categories.EX_LOC, Chairs.LOCATION AS CacusLoc, Persons_1.FNAME AS"
        " ChFN, Persons_1.LNAME AS ChLN, Chairs.CHAIRNUM FROM (((Chairs LEFT JOIN Judges "
        "AS Judges_1 ON Chairs.JUN=Judges_1.JUN) LEFT JOIN Persons AS Persons_1 ON Judges"
        "_1.PID=Persons_1.PID) RIGHT JOIN (Persons RIGHT JOIN (JudgeTypes RIGHT JOIN (Jud"
        "ges RIGHT JOIN ExhibitJudges ON Judges.JUN=ExhibitJudges.JUN) ON JudgeTypes.JCAT"
        "=Judges.JCAT) ON Persons.PID=Judges.PID) ON Chairs.CHAIRNUM=JudgeTypes.CHAIRNUM)"
        " LEFT JOIN (Categories RIGHT JOIN JudgeTypeCategories ON Categories.NCAT=JudgeTy"
        "peCategories.NCAT) ON JudgeTypes.JCAT=JudgeTypeCategories.JCAT; "
    OnOpen ="[Event Procedure]"
    OnClose ="[Event Procedure]"
    DatasheetFontName ="Arial"

CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False
'    SciFairMaster.mdb  (All class objects and modules)

'    it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by
'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.

'    This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.

'    You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private exhjudrs As Recordset
Private ExCount As Integer
Private criteria As String
Private jnum As Long
Private Estr As String
Private chnum As Long
Private AssistChrsRS As Recordset
Private ChStr As String
Private ShortChStr As String
Private ShorterChStr As String
Private PChairName As String
Private Sub GroupHeader0_Format(Cancel As Integer, FormatCount As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  '  rev 540 note:  tbTeam checks the Category Team flag - may never be a team category again
  If Mid(Me.tbTeam, 1, 3) = "Rem" Then  'Remember: Mark Teamwork on cards
     Me.tbTeam.FontBold = True
  Else
     Me.tbTeam.FontBold = False
  End If
  Me.tbCHAIRNUM.Visible = False
  ' Get assistant chairs.
  If Mid(Me.tbCategory, 1, 12) = "JCAT not Set" Then
    Me.tbCategory.FontBold = True
  Else
    Me.tbCategory.FontBold = False
  End If
  chnum = IIf(IsNull(Me.tbCHAIRNUM), 0, Me.tbCHAIRNUM) 'From Table JudgeTypes
  ChStr = ""
  ShortChStr = ""
  ShorterChStr = ""
  PChairName = ""
  With AssistChrsRS
  .MoveFirst
  If Not .EOF Then
    'Dim test As String
    'test = !Type
    'Dim tstnum As Long
    'tstnum = !CHAIRNUM
    ' Find the primary Chair person (normally one in JudgeTypes Table)
    .FindFirst "CHAIRNUM = " & chnum & " AND Type = 'P'"
    If Not .NoMatch Then
      Dim cnum As Long
      Dim stype As String
      cnum = !CHAIRNUM
      stype = !Type
      ChStr = ChStr & !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
      PChairName = !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
      ShortChStr = ShortChStr & !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
      ShorterChStr = ShorterChStr & Mid(!FNAME, 1, 1) & ". " & !LNAME
    Else
      PChairName = " N/A "
    End If
    .MoveFirst
    Do While Not .EOF
     If !ASSISTING = chnum Then ' And !STATUS = "A" Then
        'tstnum = !CHAIRNUM
        Dim stat As String
        stat = IIf(IsNull(!STATUS), "x", !STATUS)
        If stat = "A" Then
          ChStr = ChStr & ", " & !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
          ShortChStr = ShortChStr & ", " & Mid(!FNAME, 1, 1) & ". " & !LNAME
          ShorterChStr = ShorterChStr & ", " & Mid(!FNAME, 1, 1) & ". " & !LNAME
        End If
     End If
    .MoveNext
    Loop
  End If
  End With
  Dim lentb As Integer
  lentb = 50 ' This depends on the font and length of box
              ' determine by trial and error?? at 10size arial takes about 55 total
  If Len(ChStr) < lentb - 10 Then  ' String will fit in textbox
    Me.tbChairs = "Chairs: " & ChStr
  Else
    If Len(ShortChStr) < lentb - 10 Then 'Sting will fit with assist initials
       Me.tbChairs = "Chairs: " & ShortChStr
    Else
      If Len(ShorterChStr) < lentb - 10 Then  ' all fnames initialed works
        Me.tbChairs = "Chairs: " & ShorterChStr
      Else ' must remove third name)
        Dim teststr As String
        Dim firstcomma As Integer
        Dim secondcomma As Integer
        'try shortchstr first'
        firstcomma = InStr(1, ShortChStr, ", ")
        secondcomma = InStr(firstcomma + 1, ShortChStr, ", ")
        'Remove third name
        teststr = Mid(ShortChStr, 1, secondcomma - 1)
        If Len(teststr) < lentb - 10 Then
          Me.tbChairs = "Chairs: " & teststr
        Else 'last try remove third name from shorterstr
          firstcomma = InStr(1, ShorterChStr, ", ")
          secondcomma = InStr(firstcomma + 1, ShorterChStr, ", ")
          'Remove third name
          teststr = Mid(ShorterChStr, 1, secondcomma - 1)
          If Len(teststr) < lentb - 5 Then
             Me.tbChairs = "Chr: " & teststr
          Else
             Me.tbChairs = "Chair: " & PChairName
          End If
        End If
      End If
    End If
  End If
  'At this time, me.JUN is not available, so  I get it from the textbox
  jnum = Me.tbJUN
  'Rev 540  added teamex
  criteria = "SELECT ExhibitJudges.EXN, ExhibitJudges.JUN, ExhibitData.TeamEx FROM ExhibitData " & _
      "RIGHT JOIN ExhibitJudges ON ExhibitData.EXN = ExhibitJudges.EXN " & _
      "WHERE ExhibitJudges.JUN = " & jnum & " ORDER BY ExhibitJudges.EXN"
  'criteria = "SELECT JUN, EXN FROM ExhibitJudges WHERE " & _
  '           "JUN = " & jnum & " ORDER BY EXN"
  Set exhjudrs = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Me.tbExhibitnums = ""
  ExCount = 0
  With exhjudrs
    If .EOF Then Exit Sub
    ' rev 540 added teamex flag  Note that I rely on the width of the textbox and raparound to
    ' properly format the text box - instead of adding CRLF and counting...  Each exhibit must take
    ' exactly 7 characters.
    Do While Not .EOF
      If Len(!EXN) = 3 Then
        If ExCount = 0 Then
           Estr = "_" & !EXN & IIf(exhjudrs!TeamEx, "T ", "  ")
        Else
           Estr = " _" & !EXN & IIf(exhjudrs!TeamEx, "T ", "  ")
        End If
      Else  ' must be 4
        Estr = "_" & !EXN & IIf(exhjudrs!TeamEx, "T ", "  ")
      End If
      Me.tbExhibitnums = Me.tbExhibitnums & Estr
      ExCount = ExCount + 1
      .MoveNext
    Loop
  End With
  
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description & vbCrLf & " Is ExhibitJudges EMPTY?"
  End Sub
Private Sub GroupHeader0_Print(Cancel As Integer, PrintCount As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError

  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Report_Close()
   AssistChrsRS.Close
End Sub
Private Sub Report_Open(Cancel As Integer)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  criteria = "SELECT Persons.FNAME, Persons.LNAME, Chairs.ASSISTING, " & _
    "Chairs.STATUS, Chairs.TYPE, Chairs.CHAIRNUM FROM " & _
    "Persons RIGHT JOIN (Judges RIGHT JOIN Chairs ON " & _
    "Judges.JUN = Chairs.JUN) ON Persons.PID = Judges.PID "
  Set AssistChrsRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  ' The report is driven by Exhibit Judges.  There is a chance that
  ' A judge has been assigned exibits, then accidently set inactive. This will
  ' check out this and give a warning if so.
  Dim JudgeExhibitsRS As Recordset
  criteria = "SELECT JUN FROM ExhibitJudges ORDER BY JUN"
  Set JudgeExhibitsRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  Dim rs As Recordset
  Dim missing As String
  Dim statusnotA As String
  Dim jcatnull As String
  statusnotA = ""
  missing = ""
  jcatnull = ""
  criteria = "SELECT JUN, STATUS, JCAT FROM Judges ORDER BY JUN"
  Set rs = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
  With JudgeExhibitsRS
     If Not .EOF Then ' do only if records
       Dim curjun As Integer
       curjun = 0
       Do While Not .EOF
         If !JUN <> curjun Then '   check if in active judges (this report rs)
            curjun = !JUN  ' use below and skip the rest
            With rs
              .FindFirst "JUN = " & curjun
              If .NoMatch Then
                 missing = missing & curjun & ", "
              Else ' found judge
                If IsNull(!STATUS) Or !STATUS <> "A" Then
                 statusnotA = statusnotA & curjun & ", "
                End If
                If IsNull(!JCAT) Then
                 jcatnull = jcatnull & curjun & ", "
                End If
              End If
            End With
         End If
         .MoveNext
       Loop
     Else
       MsgBox "FYI: There are no Judge Assignments in ExhibitJudges table!"
     End If
  .Close
  rs.Close
  End With
  If Len(missing) > 1 Then
    MsgBox "Following Judges have exhibit assignments" & vbCrLf & _
           "(are in ExhibitJudges table) but they " & vbCrLf & _
           "DO NOT EXIST in Judges table" & vbCrLf & _
           "These Labels Print First. Fix the Problem(s)!" & vbCrLf & _
           missing
  End If
  If Len(jcatnull) > 1 Then
    MsgBox "Following Judges have exhibit assignments" & vbCrLf & _
           "(are in ExhibitJudges table) and are in Judges table" & vbCrLf & _
           "But JCAT is blank" & vbCrLf & _
           "These Labels Print Second. Fix the Problem(s)!" & vbCrLf & _
            jcatnull
  
  End If
  If Len(statusnotA) > 1 Then
    MsgBox "Following Judges have exhibit assignments" & vbCrLf & _
           "(are in ExhibitJudges table) and are in Judges table" & vbCrLf & _
           "But STATUS is not set Active ('A') " & vbCrLf & _
           "Labels ARE INCLUDED NORMALLY but... Fix the Problem anyway!" & vbCrLf & _
           statusnotA
  
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
